video.title: Doctor Stranger
video.synopsis: After fleeing North Korea, Park Hoon becomes a top surgeon in South Korea and vows to reunite with the woman he left behind.

episodes.synopsis: After following in his father's footsteps to become a surgeon in North Korea, Hoon falls for a girl whose family is purged from their homeland.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: With help from his father, Hoon escapes to Budapest with Jae Hee in tow. But along with their freedom comes unfathomable sacrifice.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Chang Yi reunites with her mother when she gets to Seoul. Meanwhile, Hoon befriends a little girl, Jung Min, whose father needs his help.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The hospital chairman divides the cardiothoracic surgery team in two and cooks up a competition to operate on the prime minister's heart.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jae Joon blames Hoon for a patient's death. Later, Mr. Rhim calls with extraordinary news: He's found Hoon's long-lost love, Jae Hee.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Hoon is convinced that beautiful doctor Seung Hee is actually Jae Hee, his long-lost love. Trouble is, she treats him like a complete stranger.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Though he suspects that Seung Hee might be a spy from North Korea, Hyung Wook can't deny her skills and offers her a job on his surgery team.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: To settle their rivalry once and for all, Hoon and Jae Joon form teams to perform the same cardiothoracic surgery on a set of twins.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: After an unsettling call from Chang Yi, Hoon leaves the hospital to find Seung Hee, who failed to report for a scheduled surgery.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After losing to Hoon in the surgery contest due to complications, Jae Joon demands a rematch. But Joon Gyu declines his request.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Joon Gyu tells Soo Hyeon that he'll allow her to leave his home and live alone under one condition: that she must get engaged to Jae Joon.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Jae Joon accepts when Hoon approaches him with a potential surgery for their rematch, but Joon Gyu is strongly against it.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jae Joon asks Soo Hyeon to come with him to the United States if he's asked to leave the hospital, but her answer is less decisive than he expected.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: A shocking announcement reveals that Jaeil University Hospital, and not Myeonwoo, will handle the prime minister's heart surgery.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When Hoon injures his finger during surgery, he asks Jae Joon to send someone from his team for backup. But Soo Hyeon makes an executive decision.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Seung Hee tells the prime minister that she will complete the task instead of Hoon and asks him to choose Jae Joon as the operating surgeon.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: When Hoon returns to the hospital and strolls into the surgery room, a stunned Joon Gyu orders Jung Han to block Hoon's success at any cost.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Faced with an ethical dilemma, Hoon declines to do the surgery and forfeits the contest to Jae Joon, who's subsequently named acting chairman.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Soo Hyeon finds Joon Gyu lying on the floor of his office and orders Jae Joon to leave the hospital. Meanwhile, Hoon tries to meet the president.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Hoon and Seung Hee find themselves at a dead end when the president goes back on his promise. Meanwhile, Cha Jin Soo comes back to life.
episodes.title: Episode 20
